segments.text: Office Supplies , Inc . Robert speaking , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , Robert . This is Janet Reese calling from American Advertising . We placed an order with you about a week ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , Ms . Reese . I remember , you spoke with me . Is there a problem ?
segments.speaker: S1
